questions.subject: comfyui-consistency-decoder
questions.question: What is the Consistency Decoder for in ComfyUI?
questions.answer: The Consistency Decoder is used to decode images and videos that were generated with the OpenAI VAE model, enhancing the stability and consistency of the output.

questions.subject: comfyui-consistency-decoder
questions.question: Where should I place the downloaded OpenAI VAE model for use with comfyui-consistency-decoder?
questions.answer: You should place the downloaded OpenAI VAE model (decoder.pt) in the 'model/vae' directory for use with comfyui-consistency-decoder.

questions.subject: comfyui-consistency-decoder
questions.question: Where can I find the download link for the OpenAI VAE model?
questions.answer: You can find the download link for the OpenAI VAE model at https://openaipublic.azureedge.net/diff-vae/c9cebd3132dd9c42936d803e33424145a748843c8f716c0814838bdc8a2fe7cb/decoder.pt.

questions.subject: comfyui-consistency-decoder
questions.question: Where can I find an example workflow for using comfyui-consistency-decoder?
questions.answer: You can find an example workflow for using comfyui-consistency-decoder in './workflow.json'.
